description.value: This profile describes constraints for a Transfer Summary. The Transfer Summary standardizes critical information for exchange of information between providers of care when a patient moves between health care settings. Standardization of information used in this form will promote interoperability; create information suitable for reuse in quality measurement, public health, research, and for reimbursement.

definition.value: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] type (ValueSet: TransferDocumentType http://hl7.org/fhir/ccda/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2.4) (CONF:2219-2481).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] event (CONF:2219-2464).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] section (CONF:2219-2588) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-2466) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-2470).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="48765-2" Allergies and Adverse Reactions (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-2467).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-2494).

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core AllergyIntolerance Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-allergyintolerance) (CONF:2219-2468). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core MedicationStatement Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-medicationstatement) (CONF:2219-2486). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Condition Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-condition) (CONF:2219-2490). SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] U.S. Core ObservationResults Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-observationresults) (CONF:2219-2499). SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] U.S. Core VitalSigns Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-vitalsigns) (CONF:2219-2503). SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] U.S. Core SmokingStatus Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-smokingstatus) (CONF:2219-2524). SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] U.S. Core Procedure Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-procedure) (CONF:2219-2528). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Immunization Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-immunization) (CONF:2219-2580). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] FamilyMemberHistory (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/FamilyMemberHistory) (CONF:2219-2566).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-2482) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-2483).

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-2485).
